languages.text: {n}Стоит вам коснуться его израненной плоти, как техножрец переводит взгляд на вас и неожиданно отчетливо произносит:{/n} "Многие искры угасли... но не все. Электрические пастыри живы. Во тьме я... слышал их молитвы. Отыщи, спаси. Вознеси гимн восстановления... контактной цепи, дабы открылось... скрытое".

{n}As soon as you touch the Tech-Priest's battered flesh, he shifts his gaze to you and says, with sudden clarity,{/n} "Many sparks have gone out... but not all. The electric shepherds are alive. In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит вам коснуться его израненной плоти, как техножрец переводит взгляд на вас и неожиданно отчетливо произносит:{/n} "Многие искры угасли... но не все. Электрические пастыри живы. Во тьме я... слышал их молитвы. Отыщи, спаси. Вознеси гимн восстановления... контактной цепи, дабы открылось... скрытое".

In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."

In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."

languages.text: {n}Sobald du das geschundene Fleisch des Techpriesters berührst, richtet er seinen Blick auf dich und sagt mit plötzlicher Klarheit:{/n} "Viele Funken sind erloschen ... aber nicht alle. Die elektrischen Hirten sind am Leben. In der Dunkelheit ... Ich habe ihre Gebete gehört. Findet sie. Rettet sie. Rezitiert die Hymne ... der Kontaktkreis-Restoration, damit Ihr seht ... was verborgen liegt."
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the Tech-Priest's battered flesh, he shifts his gaze to you and says, with sudden clarity,{/n} "Many sparks have gone out... but not all. The electric shepherds are alive. In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sobald du das geschundene Fleisch des Techpriesters berührst, richtet er seinen Blick auf dich und sagt mit plötzlicher Klarheit:{/n} "Viele Funken sind erloschen ... aber nicht alle. Die elektrischen Hirten sind am Leben. In der Dunkelheit ... Ich habe ihre Gebete gehört. Findet sie. Rettet sie. Rezitiert die Hymne ... der Kontaktkreis-Restoration, damit Ihr seht ... was verborgen liegt."

languages.text: {n}Dès que vous touchez les chairs meurtries du technoprêtre, il pose son regard sur vous et vous dit avec une étonnante clarté :{/n} « De nombreuses étincelles se sont éteintes... mais pas toutes. Les électrobergers sont encore en vie. J'entends leurs prières dans l'obscurité. Trouvez-les et sauvez-les. Récitez l'hymne... de restauration des circuits de contact, afin de contempler... ce qui est caché. »
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the Tech-Priest's battered flesh, he shifts his gaze to you and says, with sudden clarity,{/n} "Many sparks have gone out... but not all. The electric shepherds are alive. In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès que vous touchez les chairs meurtries du technoprêtre, il pose son regard sur vous et vous dit avec une étonnante clarté :{/n} « De nombreuses étincelles se sont éteintes... mais pas toutes. Les électrobergers sont encore en vie. J'entends leurs prières dans l'obscurité. Trouvez-les et sauvez-les. Récitez l'hymne... de restauration des circuits de contact, afin de contempler... ce qui est caché. »

languages.text: {n}当你触碰到那位技术神甫伤痕累累的肉体时，他望向你，突然口齿清晰地说道。{/n}“众多火花已经熄灭……但仍有幸存。驭电导师还活着，他们在黑暗中……我听到了他们的祈祷。找到他们，拯救他们。吟诵接触电路修复赞美诗……只有这样，你才能看到……隐藏之物。”
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the Tech-Priest's battered flesh, he shifts his gaze to you and says, with sudden clarity,{/n} "Many sparks have gone out... but not all. The electric shepherds are alive. In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你触碰到那位技术祭司伤痕累累的肉体时，他望向你，突然口吃清晰地说道。{/n}“众多火花已经熄灭……但仍有幸存。驭电导师还活着，他们在黑暗中……我听到了他们的祈祷。找到他们，拯救他们。吟诵接触电路修复赞美诗……只有这样，你才能看到……隐藏之物。”

languages.text: {n}技術司祭のボロボロの肉体に触れた瞬間、男はこちらに視線を移し、唐突にハッキリと話し始めた。{/n}「多くの火花が消えた…だが、全てではない。電気の指導者は健在だ。暗闇の中で…私は彼らの祈りを聞いた。見つけ出せ。救い出すんだ。聖歌を…接続回路復元の聖歌を唱えれば、目の前に現れる…隠されたソレが」
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the Tech-Priest's battered flesh, he shifts his gaze to you and says, with sudden clarity,{/n} "Many sparks have gone out... but not all. The electric shepherds are alive. In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭のボロボロの肉体に触れた瞬間、男はこちらに視線を移して急にハッキリと話し始めた。{/n}「多くの火花が消えた…だが、全てではない。電気の指導者は健在だ。暗闇の中で…私は彼らの祈りを聞いた。見つけ出せ。救い出すんだ。聖歌を…接続回路復元の聖歌を唱えれば、目の前に現れる…隠されたソレが」

languages.text: {n}En cuanto tocas la carne maltrecha del Tecnosacerdote, cambia su mirada hacia ti y dice, con una claridad fulminante,{/n} «Muchas chispas se han apagado... pero no todas. Los pastores eléctricos están vivos. En la sombra... He oído sus plegarias. Encuéntrelos. Sálvelos. Recite el himno... de restauración del circuito de contacto, para que pueda contemplar... lo que está oculto».
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the Tech-Priest's battered flesh, he shifts his gaze to you and says, with sudden clarity,{/n} "Many sparks have gone out... but not all. The electric shepherds are alive. In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto tocas la carne maltrecha del Tecnosacerdote, cambia su mirada hacia ti y dice, con una claridad fulminante,{/n} «Muchas chispas se han apagado... pero no todas. Los pastores eléctricos están vivos. En la sombra... He oído sus plegarias. Encuéntrelos. Sálvelos. Recite el himno... de restauración del circuito de contacto, para que pueda contemplar... lo que está oculto».

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in hırpalanmış tenine dokunduğun an gözleri sana odaklanıyor ve beklenmedik bir netlikle konuşuyor.{/n} "Pek çok kıvılcım yitip gitti... Ancak hepsi sönmedi. Elektrik çobanları hayatta. Karanlığın içinde... Dualarını duydum. Bulun onları, kurtarın. Kontak devresi onarım... İlahisini dile getirin ki... Gizlenmiş olan... Gözler önüne serilsin."
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the Tech-Priest's battered flesh, he shifts his gaze to you and says, with sudden clarity,{/n} "Many sparks have gone out... but not all. The electric shepherds are alive. In the darkness... I heard their prayers. Find them. Save them. Recite the hymn... of contact circuit restoration, so that you may behold... what is hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in hırpalanmış tenine dokunduğun an gözleri sana odaklanıyor ve beklenmedik bir netlikle konuşuyor:{/n} "Kıvılcımlar yitmiş olabilir... Ancak hepsi sönmedi. Elektro refakatçiler hayatta. Karanlığın içinde... Dualarını duydum. Bulun onları, kurtarın. Kontak devresi onarım... İlahisini dile getirin ki... Gizlenmiş olanın... Farkına varın."
